Fachmarkt fuer Kulturgut
x
BUSY HANDS

12 - 14 May 2023
Tante Manfred + Handstand&Moral
For those who do not know it yet: FACHMARKT FOR CULTURAL GOODS is a market that has been in existence since 2021 with a focus on local tape labels. The FACHMARKT's team is made up of the people behind Shell Tapes & Recordings, Interceptor Editions, Aquarium, Prepaid Records and Golden Doom Records. The market will be a guest at BUSY HANDS FEST 2023 on May 13 and 14, 2023. And you are gladly invited! This year the market will take place as an outdoor edition in the beer garden of Tante Manfred (Neues Schauspiel Leipzig, Lützner Straße 29). In case of bad weather we have the possibility to move the event into the premises. The Busy Hands Fest has created a little special program, which starts already on Friday. Get some more info about the events over at www.busyhandsfest.com. There's a couple of concerts on Friday, May 12 evening at Handstand&Moral (about 10 min walk from Neues Schauspiel, starting at 9 pm). Feel free to drop by for some noise and drinks!
See you there!
